summary: The 24 hours of Le Mans is the most prestigious endurance motorsport event in the world. Fantelli Productions follows Great British privateer team Jota Sport, taking an intimate look at the... See full summary »
cast: Patrick Stewart|Tiff Needell|Filipe Albuquerque|Simon Dolan|Raffaele Fantelli|Bob Friend|Marc Gené|Sam Hignett|John Hindhaugh|Allan McNish|Harry Tincknell|Oliver Turvey|Mark Webber|Pete Webster
title: Journey to Le Mans
